title: ashoka university vs PES
content: PES CSE vs ashoka uni math+cs??

comments.body: First time I am seeing a comparison between Ashoka and PES. The empire of PESU seems to be expanding :vckek:

Tbh even Ashoka has a good brand. Not necessarily for CS, but it's pretty well recognised recently. They also have great opportunities with US/EU Unis such as exchange programs etc and have recently built a decent international reputation.

But again, these are for other programs like Math. I have no clue about CS.

For placements , pes obviously.
But Ashoka has one of the most excellent CS departments in literally the whole country. PhDs from Yale and MIT. If your interest is in academics definitely Ashoka. PES has good profs but it's not Ashoka level by any means

>PES has good profs

At this point even this is a stretch lol
Ashoka but a mile, awesome life and good profs
